content: Bash: cd /home/jw/code/jat && git add dashboard/src/lib/components/work/WorkCard.svelte dashboard/src/lib/components/work/WorkPanel.svelte dashboard/src/lib/stores/workSessions.svelte.ts dashboard/src/routes/work/+page.svelte dashboard/src/routes/triage/+page.svelte dashboard/src/routes/api/sessions/[name]/input/+server.js dashboard/src/routes/api/work/[sessionId]/input/+server.js && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat: Stream text from WorkCard input to terminal session live
Implements live streaming of text input from WorkCard textarea to tmux terminal
sessions. Characters are sent as the user types, enabling instant slash command
- Live streaming with 50ms debounce for responsive feel
- Toggle button to enable/disable streaming mode
- Tab key sends to terminal for autocomplete when streaming enabled
- Escape clears both textarea AND terminal input line
- Tmux sync: textarea clears when text is submitted in attached terminal
- Efficient delta streaming (only sends new characters when appending)
- Added ctrl-u support for clearing terminal input line
- Added tab key support for autocomplete
Bash: bd close jat-uiv7 --reason "Completed by FreeCanyon"
preview: Running: bd close jat-uiv7 --reason "Completed by FreeCanyo...

content: Bash: am-reservations --agent FreeCanyon --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[].path_pattern' 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo "NO_RESERVATIONS"
Bash: am-send "[jat-uiv7] Completed: Stream text from WorkCard input to terminal" "Task completed by FreeCanyon.
- Tmux sync: textarea clears when submitted in terminal
Agent is now available for next task." --from FreeCanyon --to @active --thread jat-uiv7 2>/dev/null || echo "Mail sent (or no recipients)"

content: Bash: bd list --status open --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | "[\(.priority)] \(.id) - \(.title) (\(.issue_type))"' | head -15
Bash: bd list --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.status == "open") | "[\(.priority)] \(.id) - \(.title[0:60]) (\(.issue_type))"' | head -15
